Classes

classes.Rmd
library(fsmc)

Classes in fsmc

fsmc is built around classes which simplify common workflows with microbial communities.

  • Implement S4 and why?
  • How to use classes

MiCo

The MiCo class serves as the standard way to save and work with data on the metabolism of a microbial community. Read more about the class in the MiCo class documentation.

MiCoAl

The MiCoAl class serves as the standard way to align one or more MiCo objects. Read more about the class in the MiCoAl class documentation.
